title: Sad Dad Had Bad Lad
itunes:title: Sad Dad Had Bad Lad
description:
God of War Ragnarök has landed, and we talk about as much as we're allowed this week, Brad played a bit of The Callisto Protocol, a whole bunch of new (and old) Silent Hill got announced, Kojima's collection of digital celebrities continues to get out of control, and more!

Advertise on The Nextlander Podcast at Gumball.fm, or support us on Patreon!

CHAPTERS

(00:00:00) NOTE: Some timecodes may be inaccurate in versions other than the ad-free Patreon version due to dynamic ad insertions. Please use caution if skipping around to avoid spoilers.
(00:00:10) Intro
(00:01:49) Show rundown
(00:02:42) Keith David
(00:05:05) The Estevez family of actors
(00:06:53) Tim Heidecker and On Cinema
(00:11:43) The Video Games
(00:11:52) God of War Ragnarök [PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5] on Nov 09, 2022
(00:45:19) First Break
(00:46:01) The Callisto Protocol [PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox One] on Dec 02, 2022
(00:57:16) The Pinball Wizard [Nintendo Switch, PC] on Oct 27, 2022
(01:01:20) Scorn [Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Oct 14, 2022
(01:04:48) Mario + Rabbids Sparks of Hope [Nintendo Switch] on Oct 20, 2022
(01:07:41) Gotham Knights [Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 5, PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Oct 21, 2022
(01:16:03) Grounded [PC, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One] on Sep 27, 2022
(01:20:19) Second Break
(01:20:58) The Silent Hill Transmission
(01:23:35) Silent Hill 2 Remake
(01:27:20) Return to Silent Hill Movie
(01:29:06) Silent Hill Townfall
(01:29:44) Silent Hill F
(01:32:32) Rocksteady Departures
(01:35:50) An original Witcher remake?!
(01:40:06) Code Veronica REmake?! Oh...
(01:43:59) Kerbal 2 gets a new Early Access date
(01:46:44) News from the Kojima-verse
(01:54:27) Who are the Game Gods?
(01:56:32) Who will Kojima scan next?
(01:58:41) Wrapping up and thanks
(02:00:13) Mysterious Benefactor Shoutouts
(02:01:38) Nextlander content updates
(02:02:47) See ya!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
